title: When walking on the beach strand, who has the right-of-way, fishermen, or walkers? Usually fishermen will have their lines sufficiently high enough so as to allow walkers to pass underneath, but there sometimes is the knuckleheads who purposely holds his line just about neck high. Thanks!
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/02/do-walkers-have-the-right-of-way-when-fishermens-lines-cross-the-surf/
